hello Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Facilis inventore possimus veritatis. Cum, cumque dicta doloribus facere fuga fugiat id ipsum, laborum laudantium nulla odit,

This is a body fitness workout mobile app prototype. User can select do workout everyday by following this app, as it will remind you to workout every 24 hours. on pressing start, it gives a list of 5 exercises that you should be performing. You can also randomize the selection process or get details about them on pressing.

 On Pressing start, you can provide the number of rep counts for each exercise. when the challenge begins, it will alternate between exercises and 30 second break. It will also play awesome fitness tracks to keep you going.

 This app is a candidate for online challenge posted by Youtuber Hitesh Choudhary.

I am Ansh Sachdeva, A Final Year CS Undergrad from New Delhi,India who loves to code anything Android or Python . If you like this mini project, then please show your support by dropping a star on its official repo (https://www.github.com/root-ansh/lco) . Contact me at the links available on this site : https://root-ansh.github.io/curioustools .

This was a challenge posted by youtuber Hitesh choudhary in one of their videos. (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VFrKjhcTAzE). more details can be found Here (https://bitbucket.org/hiteshchoudhary/lco-workout-app-challenge/src/master).
Thank you Mr Hitesh for this challenge, it was fun experience!\n\n As a part of challenge, we have to quote a virtual price, so here it goes: I am willing to convert this prototype into full fledged app in 15 days and sell at @ USD 350 , with up to 5 more major features and 6 months maintenance at an additional USD 150/month :)
